value.title: Set Up Power BI Data Gateway to Connect On-Premise Data Sources
value.excerpt: During this session, we will be discussing about how we can install Standard Data Gateway to connect with On-Premise Data sources like SQL Server.  In this session, we have taken an example of On-Premise SQL Server Database. I will explain step by step procedure to install a Gateway and then how we can

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway. This is really my thought process for how I handle connection errors to a data source from any application.    LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Avoid the full refresh with Incremental Refresh in Power BI (Premium)
value.excerpt: Is the full refresh of Incremental Refresh taking a long time? Or, even timing out? Handling deletes within Incremental Refresh in Power BI: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nKVrl0ec6uE
